meanings.definition: To have the same opinion or belief as someone else.
meanings.sent1: We were both agreeing on the best movie to watch.
meanings.sent2: The team was agreeing on the strategy for the game.
meanings.sent3: The cats were agreeing on who gets to nap in the sunny spot.
meanings.sent4: The colors in the painting were agreeing with each other perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The students were agreeing enthusiastically on the field trip destination.

meanings.definition: To be in harmony or accord.
meanings.sent1: The music and the lyrics were agreeing beautifully in the song.
meanings.sent2: The flavors in the dish were agreeing with each other.
meanings.sent3: The weather and the mood were agreeing for a relaxing day.
meanings.sent4: The elements of the design were agreeing in a stunning display.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the garden were agreeing in a vibrant display.

meanings.sent1: She was agreeing to the terms of the contract.
meanings.sent2: The students were agreeing to the school rules.
meanings.sent3: The cat was agreeing to take its medicine without a fuss.
meanings.sent4: The machine was agreeing to start after the repair.
meanings.sent5: The team was agreeing to the coach's instructions for the game.
